page.title: 16LIFESTYLES:DRAYTON BASSETT
page.content: The local residents of Drayton Bassett in general like the quiet, friendly atmosphere and unhurried way of life. many prefer the peace of the village to the noise of the City. Many residents in the village centre are retired though people tend to be younger in the newer housing areas. There were some complaints that day-trippers leave litter behind, Motorists cut through the village, ramblers sometimes stray off foot-paths onto farmland. Older residents need the convenience of the local post office and general stores owing to the restricted public transport service, many use a taxi service. There is no gas supply to the village. Recreation revolves around the public park or workingmens club with its bar, snooker table and pigeon club. There is a village scout troop,womans insitute.
